speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, following my remarks and those of the Republican leader, the Senate will be in a period of morning business until 3:30, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each, with the time equally divided and controlled between the two leaders or their designees. Following morning business, the Senate will resume consideration of the motion to proceed to S. 2663, a bill to reform the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
At 5:30 today, the Senate will proceed to a rollcall vote on the motion to invoke cloture on the motion to proceed to the product safety bill.
